skilllist.skilldesc: Yu Zhong applies <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> to enemy heroes every time he deals damage to them. <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> erupts upon reaching 5 stacks on a target. Then it begins consuming 1 stack every 0.4s to deal <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 30<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 2.5% of the target's lost HP to the target. Each stack consumed restores 6% of Yu Zhong's lost HP. When <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> erupts, Yu Zhong also gains 30% Movement Speed for 3s.

Yu Zhong infuses his power into his cloak and turns it into a weapon, which starts to attack nearby enemies after a short delay. The inner area of the cloak deals 220<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>, whereas the sharpened edge deals 275% damage and applies 2 stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font>.

Yu Zhong unleashes the Dragon Soul, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+120% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to all enemies in front and slowing them by 60% for 1s. 

Upon hitting an enemy, Yu Zhong's next Basic Attack will be enhanced, dealing 108<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. Upon hitting multiple enemies, the enhanced Basic Attack will apply multiple stacks of <font color="a6aafb">Sha Residue</font> and deal up to 200% damage.

Yu Zhong leaps towards the designated area with his full strength, dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. He is able to dash one more time in the movement direction. 
After a short delay, enemies within the area of effect will be knocked airborne for 0.6s and take 180<font color="fba51f"> (+90% Extra Physical Attack)</font> additional <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>.

After channeling for 0.6s, Yu Zhong transforms into his Black Dragon Form. For up to 7s, he cannot use any skills but can move freely and will knock back enemy heroes in his path while dealing 180<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font>. He also gains 600<font color="fba51f"> (+200% Extra Physical Attack)</font> Max HP, becomes immune to control effects, and ignores obstacles in this form.
Upon exiting the Black Dragon Form, Yu Zhong enters <font color="a6aafb">Dragonoid Form</font>, gaining increased range on all of his skills for 10s.

data.name: Yu Zhong

__data.skilldesc: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.
__data.skilldesc_text: Deal <Num2> [C1Magic Damage] to nearby enemies, [C2petrify] them for <Num1>s, and slow them by <%Num3> for <Num4>s afterward.
__data.skilldescemblem: Deal 100 (+15*Hero Level) <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies, <font color="62f8fe">petrify</font> them for 0.8s, and slow them by 50% for 0.8s afterward.

recommendmasterplan.description: Exp Lane: Balanced damage and survivability. Use Petrify for insane CC.

+6 Extra Physical Defense
+6 Extra Magic Defense

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

Gain 5 <font color="ffdfa2">Adaptive Penetration</font>.

<font color="8098ab">Gain Physical Penetration if extra Physical Attack is higher than extra Magic Power; otherwise, gain Magic Penetration.</font>

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional <%Num2> Spell Vamp, up to <Num3> stacks.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 6% Spell Vamp. Each hero kill or assist grants an additional 0.5% Spell Vamp, up to 8 stacks.

Dealing skill damage to an enemy hero recovers 5% of Max HP.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 6s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Valor: Gain 4 extra Physical Defense for 3s when taking Physical Damage, up to 20.

equiplist.equipskill1:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Fighting Spirit: Attacks grant 12 extra Physical Attack per second for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Deals extra 10% True Damage based on the damage dealt (no damage reduction counted) at full stacks.
<font color="A4AAC7">Marksmen, Mages, and Supports only receive 50% of these stacked effects</font>.
equiplist.equiptips:
+35 Extra Physical Attack
+400 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+12% Spell Vamp

equiplist.equipskill1: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Retribution: Dealing damage to the same enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row grants 50% extra Movement Speed that decays over 3s (8s cooldown).
equiplist.equiptips:
+15Physical Penetration
+80 Extra Physical Attack
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Arctic Cold: Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed of the attacker to 80% of normal for 1s.
Lifebane: Taking damage will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects of the attacker to 50% of normal for 1s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+500 Mana
+55 Extra Physical Defense
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Brute Force: Each second after dealing damage, gain 6 extra Adaptive Attack and 2% extra Movement Speed for 4s, up to 6 stacks. Gain 15% extra Control Duration Reduction at full stacks.
equiplist.equiptips:
+600 Extra Max HP
+23 Extra Physical Defense
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskill2: Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Demonize: When HP drops below 40%, gains 30% Damage Reduction for 3s and reduces skill cooldowns by 2s. The effect has a 60s cooldown.
Defiance: For every 1% HP lost, damage is increased by 0.25%, up to 15%.

data.story: Yu Zhong, the reincarnation of the Black Dragon, intends to unify the Cadia Riverlands through conquest and usher in an era of prosperity.

assist.desc: Yu Zhong works well with Mages that can initiate with CC such as Vexana and Xavier. Their control effects allow Yu Zhong to land his skills more easily.

strong.desc: Yu Zhong counters squishy Fighter heroes such as Aulus and Zilong, because they can't easily dodge Yu Zhong's skills and have a hard time with him in the early game.

weak.desc: Yu Zhong is countered by nimble Marksman heroes such as Lesley and Karrie, since it's hard for Yu Zhong to land his skills, making him a vulnerable and easy target.
